title: London, BL, Add. 17257
Portions of both parts of a Choir-book, comprising Psalms xlv.—lxxxii., which were chanted before the altar at the celebration of the holy Eucharist.
first part (ܐ)
second part (ܒ)
Large portions of the second part of a Choir-book, containing the Psalms, according; to the Peshitta version
Part a
Part b
Part c
Part d
fragment of the first part of a Choir-book, containing Psalms xl. 6—xiii. 8, according to the Peshitta version.
portion of the second part of a Choir-book, containing Psalms lv. 16—lvi. 13, according to the Peshitta version
Fragments of the second part of a Choir-book
Fragments of Psalms cxiv. 18—cxvii. 5, cxviii. 129—160
Part of the second song of Moses, Deut, xxxii. 8—24, according to the Peshitta version.
Psalms x. 8—xi. 1, according to the Peshitta version
Some short hymns
portion of the first part of a Choir-book, comprising Ps. xiv. 1—6, according to the Peshitta version
fragment of the second part of a Choir-book, containing Psalms cxxxix. 4—cxlii. 3, according to the Peshitta version
Portions of the Psalms, according to the Peshitta version; viz. Ps. xxii. 24—28; xxiii. 5—xxiv. 4; xxxv. 26—xxxvi. 4; and xxxvii. 2—9.
Portions of the Psalms, translated from the Septuagint by Paul of Tellā
Psalms iii. 8—xvi. 11, according to the Peshitta version
Psalms xxi. 7—xxv. 6, according to the Peshitta version
Psalms xliv. 22—xlvi. 2 and xlviii. 8— xlix. 18, according to the Peshitta version
Ps. lxxviii. 26—45, according to the Peshitta version
Psalms cxlix., cl., and cli.
Part of the first song of Moses, according to the Peshitta version

otherLimit: ܫܠܡ̣ܘ ܐܝܟ ܒܟܬܐ ܕܕܝܪ̈ܝܐ ܩܕܝ̈ܫܐ ܕܒܕܝܪܐ ܕܣܘܪ̈ܝܝܐ ܡܙܡܘܪ̈ܐ ܕܡܙܡܪܝܢ ܩܕܡ ܡܕܒܚܐ ܒܥܕܢܐ ܕܩܘܪܒܐ. ܕܩ̇ܪܐ ܢܨ̇ܠܐ ܥܠ ܣܒܐ ܡܚ̣ܝܠܐ ܕܣ̣ܪܛ ܘܥܠ ܪܒܢ ܚܒܝܒ ܕܥ̇ܕܪ. ܘܥܠ ܟܠ ܕܐܫܬܘܬܦ. ܗ̈ܘܝ ܗܠܝܢ ܫܢܬ ܐܠܦ ܘܢ̇܏ܢܛ ܕܝ̈ܘܢܝܐ ܢܟܝ̈ܠܐ.
